title: amazon 20% off discount on selected items

Terms & Conditions

To receive 20% off purchase price:

Add 1 qualifying product in the list below to your Shopping Cart via the “Add to Shopping Cart” button on the product information page.
Add the promotion code "GDC20" at checkout
Offer only applies to orders placed after 12:01 a.m. (PT) February 27, 2017.
Offer expires at 11:59 p.m. (PT) March 10, 2017.
